DataCamp (Boston, US Remote)

DataCamp is a young team of data analytics enthusiasts that provide affordable interactive data science and statistics education to the world.

We do not believe in an educational framework that centers on passively reading books, or on watching YouTube videos that put a focus on the instructor, and not the scholar. The best way to learn is by doing!

Currently hiring:

Software Engiener (Growth) Data Science Journalist Content Partnership (R or Python Focus) User Retention Manager

If you're interested in applying please visit https://www.datacamp.com/careers or e-mail nicole@datacamp.com
